hero.headline: Explore the Hidden Paradise: Lombok Awaits You
hero.subheadline: Discover the beauty of Sasak culture, endless beaches, and the peak of Mount Rinjani with Sasak Journey.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Experience Lombok like never before with our trusted travel services

localExpertise.title: Local Expertise
localExpertise.description: Our team consists of local guides who know every hidden gem and secret spot on Lombok Island.

bestPrice.title: Best Price Guarantee
bestPrice.description: We offer competitive prices with no hidden fees. Find a better deal? We'll match it!

support24.title: 24/7 Support
support24.description: Our customer support team is available around the clock to assist you with any questions or concerns.

destinations.title: Popular Destinations
destinations.subtitle: Discover the most sought-after destinations in Lombok

mandalika.title: Mandalika
mandalika.description: Integrated tourism area with beautiful beaches, luxury resorts, and world-class MotoGP Circuit.

giliTrawangan.title: Gili Trawangan
giliTrawangan.description: Favorite tropical island with white sand, snorkeling, and vibrant nightlife.

giliNanggu.title: Gili Nanggu
giliNanggu.description: Small peaceful island with crystal clear water, perfect for relaxation and snorkeling.

giliGede.title: Gili Gede
giliGede.description: Largest island in southern Lombok with pristine natural beauty and peaceful atmosphere.

pinkBeach.title: Pink Beach
pinkBeach.description: Unique beach with pink-colored sand and exotic ocean panorama.

sasakTour.title: Sasak Tour
sasakTour.description: Explore traditional Sasak villages and learn about the culture and handicrafts of Lombok.

mataramTour.title: Mataram Tour
mataramTour.description: Explore Lombok's capital with royal history, ancient temples, and local cuisine.

benangKelambu.title: Benang Kelambu Waterfall
benangKelambu.description: Stunning waterfall with natural curtain of water in the tropical forest.

senggigi.title: Senggigi
senggigi.description: Classic Lombok tourist destination with beautiful sunset and complete facilities.

mandalikaCircuit.title: Mandalika Circuit
mandalikaCircuit.description: International MotoGP racing circuit with modern facilities and ocean views.

sembalunRinjani.title: Sembalun Rinjani
sembalunRinjani.description: Mountain village at the foot of Mount Rinjani, main gateway for trekking and nature tourism.

searchResults.title: Search Results
searchResults.subtitle: Found {count} packages matching your criteria
searchResults.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search filters or explore our popular destinations

transportation.title: Transportation Services
transportation.subtitle: Explore Lombok comfortably with our well-maintained fleet of vehicles. Equipped with experienced and friendly drivers who know all the tourist destinations in Lombok.
transportation.durationInfo: All rental packages are valid for 12 hours of travel
transportation.needHelpDesc: Our team is ready to help you choose the right vehicle for your journey in Lombok.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: We are ready to help you plan your dream holiday in Lombok. Contact us via the form below or through direct contact.

info.address: Jl. Pariwisata Pantai Kuta, Mandalika, Central Lombok, NTB 83573

footer.description: Sasak Journey is your best travel companion in Lombok. We provide the best tour packages and transportation for an unforgettable holiday experience.
